text: aur hamane tumase pahale aur (bhee) bahutere paigambar bheje aur hamane unako beeviyaan bhee dee aur aulaad (bhee ata kee) aur kisee paigambar kee ye majaal na thee ki koee maujiza khuda kee ijaazat ke bagair la dikhae har ek vakt (mauood) ke lie (hamaare yahaan) ek (qism kee) tahareer (hotee) hai
